mapper.select: select ideaId, title, content, likes, visits, typeId, visibility from idea where userId = #{userId} limit #{currentBegin}, #{pageSize};
select ideaId, title, content, likes, visits, typeId, visibility from idea;
select ideaId, title, content, likes, visits, typeId, visibility from idea where typeId = #{typeId} limit #{currentBegin}, #{pageSize};
select ideaId, title, content, likes, visits, typeId, visibility from idea where title like #{title} limit #{currentBegin}, #{pageSize};
select ideaId, title, content, likes, visits, typeId, visibility from idea where ideaId = #{ideaId};
mapper.insert: insert into idea (title, content, likes, visits, typeId, userId, visibility) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{likes}, #{visits}, #{typeId}, #{userId}, #{visibility});
mapper.update: update idea set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, likes = #{likes}, visits = #{visits}, typeId = #{typeId}, visibility = #{visibility} where ideaId = #{ideaId};
